categories.name: Vegetarian
categories.description: Pizza with no meat. If you are vegan, or just prefer pizza without meat, this is for you.

categories.name: Classic
categories.description: Pizzas tested by time. Never go out of fashion. Always a good choise

categories.name: Premium
categories.description: Extravagant pizza with unexpected tastes. This pizzas will surprise you even if you are experienced pizza enjoyer

slider.name: Get a big pizza for only 129.99
slider.description: Order a big pizza for only 129.99 instead of 199.99. Applies only for such pizzas as Margarita, Texas, Pepperoni and Curry. Does't work for delivery. Viable only on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.

slider.name: Get five pizzas for only 749.99
slider.description: Order a bundle of 5 pizzas: Pepperoni, Hawaii, BBQ, Country and Toscana. Doesn't sums with other actions. Works every day for regular orders and delivery.

slider.name: Free pizza after 30 minute delivery.
slider.description: We are so fast, that we are able to deliver pizza for less than half an hour. If we fail, you get a free pizza.
